subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Fantasy Sports
Football
lead_paragraph: CBS Corp.’s Internet unit won the right to use N.F.L. players’ names and statistics for free in fantasy sports leagues it sponsors, after a judge ruled the information was in the public domain.
snippet: CBS Corp.’s Internet unit won the right to use N.F.L. players’ names and statistics for free in fantasy sports leagues it sponsors, after a judge ruled the information was in the public domain.
